attributes.action: Unlawful removal of Children by LA. Legal aid for all family matters.
attributes.additional_details: I do not wish to put my evidence here just yet but am willing to at a meeting or debate.  Thank you.
attributes.background: Unlawful removal of Children by the LA, unfair reporting so they can be internationally Adopted for financial gain.  There is a severe "conflict if interest" when Social Workers have their own fostering and adoption businesses and are receiving huge amounts of moneyfrom DfE.
